title: I have doubt how do I know that I was failed again on backlog exam ?

comments.body: You'll get the backlog results just like any other sem result on PESU academy. That's how you come to know your grade
Will there  be separate column for backlog results ?
It think it appears normally only. Not sure.

How do I know that the backlog results are out ? 
Do u have any idea that when the backlog results of sem 1 will out ?
No idea, maybe keep checking pesu notifications
PESU app Results page. Keep checking it , you will get the backlog results at the end of all courses with a seperate row
